video_prompt: An anime-style character's confident, dynamic pose shifts subtly. Her eyes glance around. Her hair sways gently. Fabric creases with minimal movement. Braided cords with tassels subtly swing. Her hands occasionally adjust the fingerless gloves. Boots shift weight. The overall white background remains.
image_prompt: Anime girl, full body, white background, long straight purple hair, purple eyes, modern cyber outfit: white cropped hoodie with geometric logo, black bra, layered purple skirt, black shorts, black belt with utility pouch, blue cords, black fingerless gloves, chunky black boots with purple trim. Confident pose, looking at viewer.
refined_video_prompt: An anime character's confident pose subtly shifts. Her eyes glance around, hair swaying gently. Fabric creases minimally as braided cords with tassels subtly swing. Hands occasionally adjust fingerless gloves, and boots shift weight. The white background remains static.
